TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfilePropertySettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ProfilePropertySettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 节的方法。

span.span: The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the section of a configuration file.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式创建、访问和修改添加到配置文件的节的子节的单个属性的定义的方法 `properties` `profile` 。The class provides a way to programmatically create, access, and modify the definition of an individual property added to the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of a configuration file. `profile`配置文件的部分指定用户配置文件的架构。The `profile` section of the configuration file specifies a schema for user profiles. 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用部分中指定的信息 `profile` 来生成一个名为的类 `ProfileCommon` ，该类派生自 。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . `ProfileCommon`类定义基于配置文件的节的子节中定义的属性 `properties` `profile` 。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 此类的实例是为每个用户配置文件创建的，你可以通过属性访问代码中的各个配置文件值 。An instance of this class is created for each user profile, and you can access the individual profile values in your code through the property. 有关配置文件属性的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Profile Properties 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100))。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100)). 有关添加到的配置文件功能的详细信息 [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)] ，请参阅 [ASP.NET Profile Properties 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100))。For more information about the profile features added to [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 包含对象集合的属性值 。The following code example shows how to access the property value, which contains a collection of objects. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/CS/profilesection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/VB/profilesection.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用配置文件的部分中指定的信息 `profile` 来生成一个名为的类 `ProfileCommon` ，该类派生自 。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 类允许访问和修改各个用户配置文件的值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`类定义基于配置文件的节的子节中定义的属性 `properties` `profile` 。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 创建类的实例时指定的参数值 将用于定义类中的关联属性 `ProfileCommon` 。The parameter values that you specify when you create an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. 有关配置文件属性的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Profile Properties 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100))。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示动态生成的 类中关联的属性是否可由匿名用户设置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the associated property in the dynamically generated class can be set by anonymous users.

value.span: 如果 类中关联的属性可由匿名用户设置，则为 ；否则为 ，指示匿名用户不能更改属性值。

span.span: if the associated property in the class can be set by anonymous users; otherwise, , indicating that anonymous users cannot change the property value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用配置文件的部分中指定的信息 `profile` 来生成一个名为的类 `ProfileCommon` ，该类派生自 。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 类允许访问和修改各个用户配置文件的值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`类定义基于配置文件的节的子节中定义的属性 `properties` `profile` 。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 你为类的实例指定的属性值 将用于定义类中的关联属性 `ProfileCommon` 。The property values that you specify for an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. 如果 `ProfileCommon` 匿名用户在 属性值为时更改了类中的属性，则会引发异常 `false` 。An exception is thrown if a property in the `ProfileCommon` class is changed by an anonymous user when the property value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用配置文件的部分中指定的信息 `profile` 来生成一个名为的类 `ProfileCommon` ，该类派生自 。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section of the configuration file to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . 类允许访问和修改各个用户配置文件的值。The class allows you to access and modify the values for individual user profiles. `ProfileCommon`类定义基于配置文件的节的子节中定义的属性 `properties` `profile` 。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 你为类的实例指定的属性值 将用于定义类中的关联属性 `ProfileCommon` 。The property values that you specify for an instance of the class will be used to define an associated property in the `ProfileCommon` class. `ProfileCommon`当单独的用户配置文件不包含该属性的值时，默认值将用作关联类属性的初始值。The default value is used as the initial value for the associated `ProfileCommon` class property when an individual user profile does not contain a value for the property. 属性可以是一个字符串值、一个 xml 编码的值 (属性的序列化模式是 xml 序列化的) 或者，如果该属性的序列化模式为二进制序列化) ，则 (64 编码的二进制字符串。The property may be a string value, an XML-encoded value (serialization mode for the property is XML serialization) or a base-64-encoded binary string (if the serialization mode for the property is binary serialization). ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置序列化命名属性时要使用的提供程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a provider to use when serializing the named property.

value.span: 来自 属性的提供程序名，或一个空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The name of a provider from the property, or an empty string ("").
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件提供程序是存储用户配置文件值的数据源。Profile providers are data sources in which user-profile values are stored. 可以在配置文件的节的子节中指定配置文件提供程序 `providers` `profile` 。You can specify profile providers in the `providers` subsection of the `profile` section of a configuration file. 如果此属性的值为空字符串，则使用属性中指定的默认提供程序 。If the value of this property is an empty string, the default provider specified in the property is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置动态生成的 类中关联的属性的类型名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type of the associated property in the dynamically generated class.

value.span: 有效的完全限定类型引用或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A valid, fully qualified type reference, or an empty string ("").
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为有效类型引用时，此类型将用于生成的类中的命名属性 `ProfileCommon` 。When set to a valid type reference, this type is used for the named property in the generated `ProfileCommon` class. 类型引用的格式如下 (不需要用括号括起来) ： `Namespace.Typename, Assemblyname[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]`The type reference is formed as follows (items in brackets are not required): `Namespace.Typename, Assemblyname[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]` 例如：For example: `"ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType, Example.Assembly, Version=%ASSEMBLY_VERSION%, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=%MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%"` ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/CS/profilesection.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection/VB/profilesection.vb#18)]
